nodes.text: The Avenue of the Satrapy was a street near Satrap Isstra Dirus' palace in Myrra, the capital of Akiva. During the rebellion on Akiva, a large crowd of citizens marched on the street and proceeded to storm the palace after learning about the Imperial Future Council's presence there. Later, Temmin Wexley was saved from being thrown to his death from the palace by the same crowd.
